LocalEseStoreSettings LocalEseStoreSettings Class

Definition

Namespace:
System.Fabric
Assembly:
System.Fabric.dll

Represents the optional settings for a local ESE store.

Edit

In this Article

public sealed class LocalEseStoreSettings : LocalStoreSettingsPublic NotInheritable Class LocalEseStoreSettings
    Inherits LocalStoreSettings
Inheritance
ObjectObject
LocalStoreSettingsLocalStoreSettings
LocalEseStoreSettingsLocalEseStoreSettings

Inherited Members

System.Fabric.LocalStoreSettings

StoreKindStoreKind

System.Object

Equals(Object)Equals(Object)

GetHashCode()GetHashCode()

Remarks

Please see HYPERLINK "http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/gg294139(v=exchg.10).aspx" http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/gg294139(v=exchg.10).aspx for documentation on ESE parameters.

Constructors

LocalEseStoreSettings() LocalEseStoreSettings()

Edit

Creates and initializes a new instance of the LocalEseStoreSettings class.

public LocalEseStoreSettings()Public Sub New

Properties

CompactionThresholdInMB CompactionThresholdInMB

Edit

Gets or sets a value indicating the minimum file size of a database for offline compaction to occur during open.

public int CompactionThresholdInMB { get; set; }Public Property CompactionThresholdInMB As Integer
Value
Int32 Int32

Returns the threshold in MB.

DatabasePageSizeInKB DatabasePageSizeInKB

Edit

Maps directly to JET_paramDatabasePageSize on the local ESE store.

public int DatabasePageSizeInKB { get; set; }Public Property DatabasePageSizeInKB As Integer
Value
Int32 Int32

Returns the database page size in KB.

Remarks

The specified database page size is only applied to newly created databases. Existing databases will continue to use the database page sizes they were created with if different from this setting.

DbFolderPath DbFolderPath

Edit

Gets or sets the file path that contains the local store files.

public string DbFolderPath { get; set; }Public Property DbFolderPath As String
Value
String String

The file path that contains the local store files.

DefragThresholdInMB DefragThresholdInMB

Edit

Gets or sets a value indicating the minimum logical size of a database for online defragmentation to occur the background.

public int DefragThresholdInMB { get; set; }Public Property DefragThresholdInMB As Integer
Value
Int32 Int32

Returns the threshold in MB.

EnableIncrementalBackup EnableIncrementalBackup

Edit

Gets or sets a value indicating whether the incremental backup feature is enabled for use.

public bool EnableIncrementalBackup { get; set; }Public Property EnableIncrementalBackup As Boolean
Value
Boolean Boolean

Returns true if incremental backup is enabled; otherwise, false.

IntrinsicValueThresholdInBytes IntrinsicValueThresholdInBytes

Edit

Gets or sets a value indicating the maximum value size at which updates will occur with the JET_bitSetIntrinsicLV flag. Setting this to a non-positive value will use the ESE default of 1024 bytes.

public int IntrinsicValueThresholdInBytes { get; set; }Public Property IntrinsicValueThresholdInBytes As Integer
Value
Int32 Int32

Returns the threshold in bytes.

LogBufferSizeInKB LogBufferSizeInKB

Edit

Maps to JET_paramLogBuffers on the local ESE store. There is a conversion from KB to 512 bytes (volume sector size) in the mapping.

public int LogBufferSizeInKB { get; set; }Public Property LogBufferSizeInKB As Integer
Value
Int32 Int32

The log buffer size in KB.

LogFileSizeInKB LogFileSizeInKB

Edit

Maps directly to JET_paramLogFileSize on the local ESE store. 

public int LogFileSizeInKB { get; set; }Public Property LogFileSizeInKB As Integer
Value
Int32 Int32

The log file size in KB.

Remarks

The specified log file size is only applied to newly created databases. Existing databases will continue to use the log file sizes they were created with if different from this setting.

MaxAsyncCommitDelay MaxAsyncCommitDelay

Edit

Maps directly to the cmsecDurableCommit parameter on the JetCommitTransaction2() ESE API calls when local commits are performed. 

public TimeSpan MaxAsyncCommitDelay { get; set; }Public Property MaxAsyncCommitDelay As TimeSpan
Value
TimeSpan TimeSpan

The durable lazy commit duration.

MaxCacheSizeInMB MaxCacheSizeInMB

Edit

Maps directly to JET_paramCacheSizeMax on the local ESE store.

public int MaxCacheSizeInMB { get; set; }Public Property MaxCacheSizeInMB As Integer
Value
Int32 Int32

Returns the maximum database cache size in MB.

MaxCursors MaxCursors

Edit

Maps directly to JET_paramMaxCursors on the local ESE store. 

public int MaxCursors { get; set; }Public Property MaxCursors As Integer
Value
Int32 Int32

The maximum number of allowed database cursors.

MaxDefragFrequencyInMinutes MaxDefragFrequencyInMinutes

Edit

Gets or sets a value indicating the frequency of periodic online defragmentation.

public int MaxDefragFrequencyInMinutes { get; set; }Public Property MaxDefragFrequencyInMinutes As Integer
Value
Int32 Int32

Returns the frequency in minutes.

MaxVerPages MaxVerPages

Edit

Maps directly to JET_paramMaxVerPages on the local ESE store. 

public int MaxVerPages { get; set; }Public Property MaxVerPages As Integer
Value
Int32 Int32

The maximum number of allowed version pages.

Methods

LoadFrom(CodePackageActivationContext, String, String) LoadFrom(CodePackageActivationContext, String, String)

Edit

Convenience method to create an instance of this class initialized with property values loaded from the application configuration package.

public static LocalEseStoreSettings LoadFrom(CodePackageActivationContext codePackageActivationContext, string configPackageName, string sectionName)Public Shared Function LoadFrom(codePackageActivationContext As CodePackageActivationContext, configPackageName As String, sectionName As String) As LocalEseStoreSettings
Parameters
codePackageActivationContext
CodePackageActivationContext CodePackageActivationContext

The activation context under which this code is running. Retrieved from FabricRuntime.

configPackageName
String String

The name of the configuration package (specified in the Service Manifest) containing the settings to load.

sectionName
String String

The name of the section in Settings.xml within the specified configuration package containing the settings to load.

Returns
LocalEseStoreSettings LocalEseStoreSettings

The initialized settings object.
